Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.admin.publisher

Class GetPublishersServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.admin.publisher.GetPublishersServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet("/admin/publishers")
public class GetPublishersServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The GetPublishersServlet is a servlet which task is to retrieve data corresponding all rows in the table publishers and represent them to administrator's page. doGet method is overridden.
    See Also:

      • doGet

        public void doGet​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
           throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                  java.io.IOException
        doGet method handles GET request. Retrieves data from PublisherDao.getAll(Connection).
        Overrides:
        doGet in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest object provided by Tomcat.
        response - HttpServletResponse object provided by Tomcat.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - is thrown if the request for the GET could not be handled.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if an input or output exception occurs.
